item.title: Evolution Strategies as an alternative to Reinforcement Learning for Solving the Lost Sales Inventory Management Problem
item.description: Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) agents have recently demonstrated their potential for solving sequential decision-making problems in various domains, such as playing Atari and Alpha Go games.

item.title: About
item.description: Written in Go, Hugo is an open source static site generator available under the Apache Licence 2.
